name: SimpleUtils
signal_source: Research shows 'six-in-ten downloaders have chosen not to install an app when they discovered how much personal information the app required'
description: Collection of basic utility functions that work entirely offline and request zero permissions
target_user: Privacy-conscious users who need basic utility functions but avoid apps with excessive permission requests
pain_point_evidence: Users concerned about 'permission abuse' where 'apps request access to sensitive features without clear need'
differentiation: Zero permissions vs. permission-heavy utilities, offline-first vs. cloud-dependent
subscription_fit: Premium includes expanded utility library and priority feature requests

pricing.trial_strategy: Free core utilities, premium for expanded toolkit
